Main Content

Templates

Grommet Templates provides developers and designers with a set of boilerplate layouts for common use cases that fit many of our experiences and we hope yours as well. All Grommet Templates can be themed, have the same great responsive design as our components, and can be customized to suit your design needs.

Primary Page

A bold presentation that uses a large Marquee to capture the attention of users.

Sub Page

Useful when structuring an interior navigation hub for a project.

Detail Page

Highlight feature content in the interior of your project.

Vertical Narrative

A slideshow presentation with horizontal transitions, best for storytelling.

Infographic

Display data or illustration views specifically for visual storytelling.
